paper.title: BP artificial neural network modeling of early-warning on financial derivatives' risk
paper.abstract: This paper addresses the development of an early-warning model for the risk of financial derivatives' (FD). The risks of derivatives are so complicated and the speed of spread is so rapid, that understanding the exact risk of FD by disclosure is needed. An early-warming model for derivatives is designed. After being trained and learning 342 times, the results indicate that early-warning of the risk of derivatives based on back propagation artificial neural network (BP-ANN) can be achieved.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用BP人工神经网络建立金融衍生品风险的早期预警模型，这直接属于金融风险管理的范畴。论文明确提到其目标是理解和预警金融衍生品的风险，而不是定价或投资组合管理。
